heading: HB08130
0: AN ACT SUBSTANTIALLY INCENTIVIZING FILIPINO INVENTORS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FULLY DEVELOPING THEIR INVENTIONS THAT BENEFIT THE NATION
status: Pending with the Committee on SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY since 2018-08-29
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08130
FULL TITLE : AN ACT SUBSTANTIALLY INCENTIVIZING FILIPINO INVENTORS WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FULLY DEVELOPING THEIR INVENTIONS THAT BENEFIT THE NATION
ABSTRACT : Intends to support Filipino inventors and promote their inventions, especially those that would benefit the community/nation. Seeks to grant meaningful incentives “including but not limited to financial support, study and research grants, technical, material and industry support”.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2018-08-22
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (000 2018-09-10)2. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-10-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY ON 2018-08-29
